definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: We must also consider the reaction of the person 32 (receive) the gift.
sentences.chinese: 根據題意，應該是收禮物的人的反應。

sentences.english: Fill in the blanks with proper words.
sentences.chinese: 根據題意，每空填上一個適當的英文單詞。

sentences.english: I do not know whether the answers to that intended, but also your busy schedule to give guidance on January 2.
sentences.chinese: 不知解答能否契合題意，還請您百忙中賜與指點一二。

sentences.english: First of all, try to understand the question correctly.
Also make sure that you understand just what you're being asked to do.
sentences.chinese: 太多的學生還沒有讀題就覺得自己已經理解了題意。

sentences.english: In the exams, make sure that everything you write is relevant to the questions you have been asked.
sentences.chinese: 在考試時一定要注意，你寫的所有內容都要切合題意。

sentences.english: First of all, you must fully understand the task and what you are asked to do.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你必須充分理解題意，明白自己要做什麼。

sentences.english: If you do not understand the question, you should raise your hand and ask the teacher to repeat the question.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不懂題意，你可以舉手讓老師重複一遍。
